messages.subject: Unschooling and Hallmark
messages.msgSnippet: But how incredibly sad that this reality is so wide spread and so well recognised that it is on a greeting card, yet so many people continue to send their kids
messages.messageBody:
But how incredibly sad that this reality is so wide spread and so well
recognised that it is on a greeting card, yet so many people continue to
send their kids off to school, no questions asked.

Carol

Tea Lover Denise wrote:

> I picked up the coolest Hallmark graduation card for a friend's
> daughter.
>
> The outside said:
>
> "Congratulations!"
>
> The inside said:
>
> "Now you get to read the books you really want to."
>
> I thought to myself, "What a *perfect* card to give to someone who has
> just escaped the world of conventional schooling!"

messages.subject: Unschooling and Hallmark
messages.msgSnippet: I picked up the coolest Hallmark graduation card for a friend s daughter. The outside said: Congratulations! The inside said: Now you get to read the books
messages.messageBody:
I picked up the coolest Hallmark graduation card for a friend's
daughter.


The outside said:

"Congratulations!"


The inside said:

"Now you get to read the books you really want to."


I thought to myself, "What a *perfect* card to give to someone who has
just escaped the world of conventional schooling!"


Denise, a Tea Lover in South Carolina
Stop by for a cup of tea ~ http://www.angelfire.com/sc/tealover
